channel.title: Phone Losers of America
channel.description: The happiest place in Roy, New Mexico!
channel.copyright: Psh, copyrights. Steal all our material. Do what you want. Just give us credit somewhere.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Prank phone calls and other phoneloserish things by the people at Phone Losers of America and Cacti Radio.
channel.itunes:summary: The Phone Losers of America and their prank calls have been on the web for more than 10 years now. PLA has existed in many carnations, the latest being this podcast. The show promises to entertain and inform with computer hacker and phone phreak themed tutorials, prank phone calls, songs, skits and parody commercials. This comedy podcast has no regular schedule or format but so far has managed to put out a show at least every couple of weeks. Be sure to visit the website for a complete archive of the PLA's past 10 years of content.
channel.itunes:keywords: prank, phone, calls, comedy, losers, america, phreak, crank, telephone, hack, hacker, hacking
channel.itunes:author: RedBoxChiliPepper

item.title: PLA’s 2015 Halloween Pumpkin Contest
item.dc:creator: rbcp
item.description: Every single year, PLA has a pumpkin carving contest, where listeners can send pictures of their pumpkin carving masterpieces to me. Wait, that's a lie. Actually it's about once every 4 or 5 years,...
item.content:encoded:
Every single year, PLA has a pumpkin carving contest, where listeners can send pictures of their pumpkin carving masterpieces to me. Wait, that's a lie. Actually it's about once every 4 or 5 years, when I can manage to remember to tell everyone to send me pumpkin pictures. In fact, I would have forgotten this year too, but Lea was nice enough to remind me. Thanks, Lea!

This year I had to decide between 5 entries, and it was a tough decision, but I've finally decided that Brandon is the winner, mostly because he carved GO AWAY PLA into his pumpkin and I'm pretty sure nobody else has done that yet.  He also carved a PLA logo into another pumpkin, but that one doesn't count.  Congrats, Brandon, on winning the prize of ONE FREE PLA STICKER!  YAYY!!  (Postage not included.)

Enjoy the masterful crafting of my crappy pumpkin! No go cups where harmed in the making of this carving. -Brandon

Here is Zax's entry.  He thinks that just because he's the co-host on Laugh Track Matt's show, he can misspell my name.  But no.  DISQUALIFIED, ZAX, YOU HOBO.

Dear Bradly. I made pumpkins! Yay honk the pla. -Zax

 Zeek went for extreme laziness by scribbling on his pumpkin with a marker and then taking pictures of it with a 2001-era digital camera, probably hoping that the poor image quality would trick me into thinking that he carved "Sorry I dinged your car" into it.  I wasn't born yesterday, Zeek!

Hey, it's Zeek, that one guy from that band Sonic Dive who sent you songs and stuff before.

 Dyno's pumpkin is amazing and beautiful and it has a multi-colored light in it, which is why it looks like he created 3 pumpkins here when really he only did one.  But I'm kind of suspicious of this one.  It almost looks TOO perfect, as if he used a laser in an eggbot to create the perfect winning pumpkin.  I love your pumpkin a lot, Dyno, but it doesn't say GO AWAY PLA on it, so YOU LOSE!

Hi RBCP! Here is my PLA pumpkin carving submission. Love the show! -Dyno

Finally we have Nick Vivid's pumpkin, which is nice and looks very artistic next to that nice photo in the background, but look at the bottom segment of lightning and you'll see that he accidentally chopped off a big piece of it and tried to fool me by turning it into some weird meta Xzibit lightning bolt within a lightning bolt.  I won't be fooled so easily, Nick.

Hey Roy, I finally got my pumpkin carved. Hope you like it. Thanks for the laughs. Long time fan. -Nick Vivid

 All 5 of you are awesome for wasting your time and your pumpkins on the PLA.  Even Zeek, I guess.  Thanks, you guys!

item.title: Calls of Mass Confusion Released!
item.dc:creator: rbcp
item.description: For a giant portion of the past year, Jiad has been forcing me to get up way too early on Saturday mornings so he, Banned and Justoned can film people with hidden cameras as I make...
item.content:encoded:
For a giant portion of the past year, Jiad has been forcing me to get up way too early on Saturday mornings so he, Banned and Justoned can film people with hidden cameras as I make prank calls to them.   We've caused all kinds of wacky hijinks, and Jiad has finally released the very first episode of the half-hour-long show.

The show features pranks by me, Carlito and Dwight, and has gotten pretty good reviews so far.  Jiad says a second episode will be arriving soon (remember when I said that about Telephone Falls?) so keep an eye on the Calls of Mass Confusion YouTube page for updates.

Here's a picture of me and Olga outside of PLAcon 2015 Here's a picture of Olga signing my PLA yearbook Get your PLAcon 2015 swag packs here. There seem to be a lot of them left. item.title: Friday Night Shoe
item.dc:creator: rbcp
item.description: Here's a Friday night shoe that was originally going to be a preshow to The Art of Phone Larking, but Jiad's in jail so it ended up being a preshow to Neon Nites. In this...
item.content:encoded:
Here's a Friday night shoe that was originally going to be a preshow to The Art of Phone Larking, but Jiad's in jail so it ended up being a preshow to Neon Nites.  In this show we call some home owners, some rowing club members, and a few unruly church customers.

I always forget to name a sponsor for live shows and I just didn't feel like throwing a few voicemails in the middle of the show.  Originally this show was about 2 hours and 20 minutes long, but now it's just a bit over an hour, so when you hear me talking about what a great show it was, that's just me being sarcastic because over an hour of horrible horrible show had to be chopped out to make this one listenable.

  • Punch The Wall by Rappy McRapperson
  • Smoke Cigarettes and Gamble by Ghostrappy
